page.title: 02Armed Forces using Dartmoor.
page.content: We do not have an{army barracks}in our D-Block, but we do have one about two miles away. But some{Royal Marines} come and train in our area. Sometimes they pull a barrel of water on an axle up{Shaugh Hill,}but mostly they come to our area for jogging or perhaps using our village for patrol work in preparation for posting to{Northern {Ireland.}The barracks are at { {Bickleigh}and in {Shaugh Prior}the gunfire of the marines training on their rifle range can be heard . We get quite a lot of low flying planes and helicopters and once a Harrier came down and was based at the airport in{Plymouth}which is owned by {Brymon Airways.}
